subject: Plus x pedals manual
description_text:
Hello

Your website's link to manual download leads to 404 page. I lost my paper
manual and would like to have digital version for plus x pedals, thank you.

Niilo Väisänen

conversations.body_text: Hi Niilo Väisänen,     Here is the updated download link — please check it.  https://www.simsonn.com/pages/simsonn-product-manuals
